tweets.text: @SarahInNUL @BenM_Anderson @EnvAgency @dpcarrington can you believe 10,000 complaints in 6 weeks, still no closure by @EnvAgency , harm to health with no advocate in authority @PHE_EoEngland , a govt who promises action but delivers none. We need a voice, can you help before the health effects get worse? @Cap_it_off

@SarahInNUL @EnvAgency That's astonishing - particularly since it's hardly the only environmental problem in England. It'll be interesting to get information about the impact on health too, as anecdotally, its been pretty bad.

@BenM_Anderson  we've since found out that there have been 10000+ complaints about the site in SIX WEEKS, making up 85% of the @EnvAgency 's complaints in that time. When does this become an emergency? ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è https://t.co/c44PRkEIBE

@StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_uk I'd like to register case of torture with United Nations, no one should have to suffer this sleep deprivation, haul them responsible before the international courts & treat us like the victims we are #StopTheStink

tweets.text: Do you know what else is good for physical and mental health? Fresh air. Do you know what else is good for preventing the spread of COVID? Opening the windows. A luxury residents of N-U-L don't have due to #walleysquarry #stopthestink @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe https://t.co/AXrozrvg6G

domain.name: Ongoing News Story
domain.description: Ongoing News Stories like 'Brexit'

tweets.text: People of Newcastle and Stoke, we should be worried. The 202 parts per cubic meter figure put out by @PHE_uk dwarfs these numbers from another landfill, but look at these peaks! @EnvAgency we need the data from the monitoring stations @ClareDinnisEA When do you call it dangerous? https://t.co/OAXO1TT6oF

@hopeternalall @AFCBlackpool @StinkStopthe @EUEnvironment @XRebellionUK @The_Gazette We take all environmental and residential complaints seriously and we can confirm our vehicle has been removed from this site with immediate effect.

Could @EnvAgencyMids explain why spot monitoring was done for the Chorley landfill but not for Walleys Quarry.  The pollution at Walleys is much higher, as are the complaints.  

#StopTheStink https://t.co/WSuESgJrxF

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @Cap_it_off 9-1 am then 5 am all morning I repeatedly ask what are the environment agency doing today to ensure  I aren't poisoned tonight, it will be 12th night tonight, kids have uni exams to do this week, massive disadvantage compared to lucky @KeeleUniversity students miles away.

Woke up and it stunk in my home. Had lunch in the garden, stunk. Watching TV now and it‚Äôs stinking again. 3rd call to @EnvAgency today. This is what you call a poor quality of life provided by @RedIndustries2‚Äôs poorly run Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill. #StopTheStink

tweets.text: You‚Äôd be forgiven in thinking this is a graph showing rising cases of #Covid19. It‚Äôs not. It‚Äôs showing you that over 85% of national complaints made to @EnvAgency are regarding @RedIndustries2 ‚Äòs Walley‚Äôs Quarry landfill. This is a national scandal! #StopTheStink https://t.co/scwGtl1ue8

tweets.text: @EnvAgency visiting #WalleysQuarry during the day is a start but the daytime odour is only the tip of the stinky iceberg. It's exponentially worse at night and I've come to dread sunset as that's when the landfill gas fills the house @PHE_uk #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @bbchealth
Friends of Sowe Valley sowing wild flower seed on the new meadow alongside the River Sowe @stwater @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWestMidlands @covparkranger @KeepBritainTidy https://t.co/N9o7Y5u00D
